CONTENT: 生きていたんですね 先輩
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So you're still alive.

CONTENT: 悪運は強いほうなの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I've always had the devil's luck.

CONTENT: ベルは いつから ペイル・テクノロジーズに?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Desde cuándo estás en Pale Technologies, Bel?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And since when do you work with Peil Technologies, Bel?

CONTENT: ほかに選択肢 ありませんでしたから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I had... no other choice.

CONTENT: ベルはヴァナディースの意志を 継いだのね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Así que sigues con la voluntad de Vanadis.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So you're the one carrying on the Vanadis legacy.

CONTENT: あのエアリアルって機体⸺　先輩1人で 作ったわけじゃないですよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No creaste el Aerial tú sola.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The machine called Aerial... There's no way you built it on your own.

CONTENT: 一体 何をするつもりなんです?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What are you planning to do?

CONTENT: なんで娘さんを 乗せているんですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why have your own daughter pilot it?

CONTENT: 昔と違って 随分 おしゃべりになったじゃない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ahora hablas mucho más que antes.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're much more talkative than I remember.

CONTENT: 今さら 21年前の復讐なんて 無意味ですよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es inútil vengarse de algo que ocurrió hace 21 años.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's no use taking revenge for a 21-year-old-

CONTENT: あのガンダムのパイロット 何人目なのかしら?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Cuántos pilotos precedieron al actual en ese Gundam?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That Gundam pilot... How many have there been?

CONTENT: 久しぶりに会えて うれしかった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nice to see you after so long.

CONTENT: また会いましょう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Until we meet again.

CONTENT: ええ 魔女は ペイル・テクノロジーズにいたわ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí. Hay una bruja en Pale Technologies.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes. The witch is under the wing of Peil Technologies.

CONTENT: 案の定 あぶり出されてきた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: As expected, we smoked her out.

CONTENT: 心配?　大丈夫 エアリアルは勝つわ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Si me preocupa? No. El Aerial ganará.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Worried? Not at all. Aerial will surely win.

CONTENT: 私のかわいい娘だもの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es mi querida hija, al fin y al cabo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I trust my darling daughter.

CONTENT: うっとうしいか...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: \"How you annoy me,\" huh?

CONTENT: 氷の君は なかなかヒドいことを言うな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El Soberano Helado es muy cruel.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why would the Ice Prince speak so harshly?

CONTENT: 感じ悪いですよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: He's such a creep!

CONTENT: 自分から誘ったんじゃねえのかよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Isn't he the one who invited you?

CONTENT: ああ もう あーしが腹立ってきた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Now he's even pissed me off.

CONTENT: 誕生日聞いたのが いけなかったんでしょうか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tal vez no debí preguntarle por su cumpleaños.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is it because I asked about his birthday?

CONTENT: スレッタが悪いわけじゃないよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You did nothing wrong, Suletta.

CONTENT: ちょっと優しくされたぐらいで⸺　ちょろいのよ あんたは
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Te dejaste engañar porque fue un poco amable contigo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'd say you fall for people's sweet words too easily.

CONTENT: ミオリネさん...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ms. Miorine!

CONTENT: 受けちゃったもんは仕方ねえだろ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, you can't take it back now.

CONTENT: あとは決闘でボコす...　私が許せないのは⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ahora, véncelo. -Lo que no puedo perdonarte
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Better just crush him in that duel! What I can't accept is

CONTENT: あんたが一言も相談なしに 決闘の約束を交わしてきたことよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: es que acordaras batirte en duelo sin consultármelo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: that you agreed to duel him without even consulting me.

CONTENT: ごめん... なさい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm... sorry.

CONTENT: 負けたら許さない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I won't forgive you if you lose.

CONTENT: ジェターク社からの支援は⸺　すべて打ち切らせていただきます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La empresa Jeturk retira todo su apoyo financiero.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The Jeturk company is hereby cutting off all your support.

CONTENT: 当然 ここも退寮扱いとなります
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And of course, you'll have to leave Jeturk House.

CONTENT: グエル先輩 本当に追い出されちゃうの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are they really evicting Mr. Guel?

CONTENT: CEOの命令じゃあね...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's a direct order from the CEO.

CONTENT: どこで暮らせというんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Where am I supposed to live?

CONTENT: お父上からの伝言です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tengo un mensaje de su padre.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I have a message from your father.

CONTENT: \"卒業までの学費を払ってやるのは せめてもの情けと思え\"
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Dice que le pagará la escuela hasta la graduación por compasión.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: \"Consider it an act of mercy that I'm at least paying the rest of your tuition.\"

CONTENT: 以上です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That is all.

CONTENT: にいさん...　ラウダ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Brother... Lauda.

CONTENT: ジェターク寮を頼む
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Look after Jeturk House.

CONTENT: 双方 魂の代償をリーブラに
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pongan el precio de sus almas en las balanzas de Libra.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Both parties, deposit your souls on Libra's scales.

CONTENT: 決闘者はエラン・ケレスと スレッタ・マーキュリー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Los duelistas son Elan Ceres y Suletta Mercury.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The duelists are Elan Ceres and Suletta Mercury.

CONTENT: 場所はフロント外宙域
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Será en el sector espacial externo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The location will be the airspace outside the front.

CONTENT: フロント外...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Outside the front?

CONTENT: エラン・ケレス　君は この決闘に何を賭ける?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Elan Ceres, ¿qué apostarás en este duelo?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Elan Ceres, what is your stake in this duel?

CONTENT: 僕が勝ったらエアリアルを貰う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si gano yo, me quedaré el Aerial.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If I win, Aerial will be mine.

CONTENT: スレッタ・マーキュリー　君は何を賭ける?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Suletta Mercury, ¿qué apostarás en este duelo?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suletta Mercury, what is your stake?

CONTENT: 私は...
何も賭けないということで⸺　よろしいですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shall we take it that you have nothing to gain from this?

CONTENT: まあ 待てよ 当日までに決めてくれればいいさ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There's no need to rush. Just decide by the day of the duel.

CONTENT: 構わないだろ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You don't mind, do you?

CONTENT: なんでもいいよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Whatever.

CONTENT: いつもより壁高いなー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: His walls are even higher than usual.

CONTENT: 君 あいつになんかした?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did you do something to him?

CONTENT: 私のせい... なんでしょうか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You mean it's my fault?

CONTENT: さあね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Who knows.

CONTENT: でも 君が来てから グエルもエランもおかしくなってる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero tu llegada transtornó a Guel y a Elan.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But since you arrived, both Guel and Elan haven't been themselves.

CONTENT: 僕も君のこと知りたくなってきたよ　水星ちゃん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Yo también quiero conocerte mejor, mercuriana.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Even I want to know more about you now. Mercurian Miss.

CONTENT: フロント外宙域?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Airspace outside the front?

CONTENT: お前 推進ユニット持ってんの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Do you even have a thruster unit?

CONTENT: 持ってないです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No, I don't.

CONTENT: まずいよー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This is bad!

CONTENT: ペイル寮のモビルスーツは 機動力が売りなんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Los Mobile Suits de Pale son muy ágiles.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Peil House's machines are known for their mobility!

CONTENT: まして新型が相手じゃ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: On top of that, you're facing a new model.

CONTENT: あの装備だけじゃ不利だな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Con ese equipo estás en desventaja.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You'll be at a disadvantage with this equipment.

CONTENT: すみません
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm sorry.

CONTENT: ドンマイですよー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't worry about it!

CONTENT: 決闘の諸条件は 決闘委員会の専権事項ですから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Las condiciones de los duelos las controla el comité.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The conditions of the duel are decided exclusively by the Dueling Committee.

CONTENT: どうすんだ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So what do we do?

CONTENT: 推進ユニットなんて買える金 うちにはねえぞ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No tenemos dinero para cambiar la unidad propulsora.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This House has no money to buy a thruster unit.

CONTENT: ほかの寮から借りるのは?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Can we borrow one from another House?

CONTENT: スペーシアンが あーしらに 貸してくれるわけないっしょ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Crees que los Spacians nos la prestarán?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Fat chance getting Spacians to loan one to us Earthians.

CONTENT: じゃあ 作ろっか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: How about we make one, then?

CONTENT: えー え...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh?

CONTENT: オールクリアー そのまま下へー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: All clear! Bring it on down!

CONTENT: じゃあ 推進系から確認しよっか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Empecemos por lo que sea de propulsión.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shall we start by inspecting the propulsion system?

CONTENT: これ 動くんですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Will this thing work?

CONTENT: ニカ姉なめんなよ できるに決まってんだろ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Por quién tomas a Nika? Podrá hacer algo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't underestimate Nika. There's no doubt she can do it.

CONTENT: ねっ ん...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Right?

CONTENT: 頑張る...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll do my best.

CONTENT: うちの財力じゃ これでも大赤字だよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Esto ya nos deja en números rojos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Given our finances, this is putting us in a huge deficit.

CONTENT: ああ 来月の生活費... ハア
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: How are we gonna eat next month? Man...

CONTENT: 俺たちは お前に全額ベット
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We're betting everything we have on you.

CONTENT: オッズは2.7倍
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The odds are 2.7 to 1.

CONTENT: 勝てば こいつの費用まかなえる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If we win, we'll cover her costs.

CONTENT: ま... 負けたら?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A-And if I lose?

CONTENT: 破産
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Bankruptcy.

CONTENT: 頑張ります
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll... do my best.

CONTENT: 起きた?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you awake?

CONTENT: また うなされてたわよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You were moaning in your sleep again.

CONTENT: 検査に支障はないだろ　結果は?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No afecta al estudio. ¿Cuáles son los resultados?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It doesn't interfere with the tests. How are the results?

CONTENT: 次の戦闘は問題ないわ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: En el próximo combate no habrá problemas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You should have no problem in your next battle.

CONTENT: 次の次は もたないってことか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You mean I won't survive the one after that.

CONTENT: よう　久しぶりだねえ 俺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hola. Cuánto tiempo sin verte, yo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hi there! It's been a while... Me.

CONTENT: どうも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hello.

CONTENT: 相変わらず暗いねえ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: As gloomy as ever...

CONTENT: 俺の代わりなんだからさ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're my surrogate, you know.

CONTENT: もうちょっと明るく 振る舞ってくれよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: así que sé un poco más alegre.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Can't you act a bit more cheerfully?

CONTENT: エランさま どうして ここに...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Master Elan, what are you doing here?

CONTENT: 慰問だよ 慰問
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I came to pay my respects to you guys.

CONTENT: ホルダーと決闘するんだろ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're going to duel the Holder, right?

CONTENT: 会社の指示だ 望んだわけじゃない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por órdenes de la empresa, no porque quiera.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The company ordered me to. It wasn't my idea.

CONTENT: そう言うなよ　お前にもご褒美は用意したろ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No seas así. Tendrás una recompensa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't be like that. There's something in it for you, after all.

CONTENT: 花嫁を手に入れれば 元の顔に戻れるし⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si te haces con la novia, recuperarás tu rostro original
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you get us the bride, we'll give your face back to you.

CONTENT: 市民ナンバーだって用意する
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y te daremos un número de identidad.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We'll also arrange for a citizen ID number.

CONTENT: うれしいだろ　別に
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wouldn't you like that? It doesn't matter.

CONTENT: じゃあ なんだって 身代わりを引き受けたんだ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Y por qué aceptaste hacer de mí?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Then why did you accept the role of my double?

CONTENT: こいつが呪いのモビルスーツだって 知ってるんだろ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sabías que es un Mobile Suit maldito.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You knew full well that this mobile suit was a curse.

CONTENT: 僕はとっくに⸺　呪われてるよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Yo hace tiempo que estoy maldito.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Long before that... I was already cursed.

CONTENT: 次は推力可変試験　はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Next we'll try a variable thrust test. Right.

CONTENT: 推力停止後 すぐ再始動
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Once you stop the engines, reactivate immediately. Right.

CONTENT: うん 推力安定
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Okay. Your propulsion is stable.

CONTENT: 燃焼制御機能 問題なし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The combustion control functions are working, too.

CONTENT: スレッタ そろそろ上がろっか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shall we head back, Suletta?

CONTENT: はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Right.

CONTENT: あした... はい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Tomorrow... Yes?

CONTENT: 戦える? エランさんと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Will you be ready to fight? With Mr. Elan...

CONTENT: エランさんが⸺　親切にしてくれたのは作戦で...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Lo de ser amable conmigo era una estrategia,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Mr. Elan was only kind to me... because that was his plan.

CONTENT: なのに 私 喜んじゃって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero a mí me alegró mucho.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And yet, I was really happy.

CONTENT: バカみたいで...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I feel so dumb.

CONTENT: そうね バカみたい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Exactly. It was dumb.

CONTENT: 私もエランの言うとおりだと思うよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: In fact, Elan's right about you.

CONTENT: 実際 あんた うっとうしいし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You really are annoying.

CONTENT: ミオリネさん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ms. Miorine...

CONTENT: でも それがあんたじゃん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But that's just how you are.

CONTENT: うっとうしいくらい絡んできて...　私の言うことを聞かずに 勝手に動いて...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Te involucras hasta ser un incordio y actúas sin tenerme en cuenta.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You annoy me by meddling in my affairs and act on your own without listening to me...

CONTENT: 進めば2つなんでしょ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Move forward, gain two, right?

CONTENT: そのあんたが なんで逃げてるの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So how could you run away here?!

CONTENT: こんなとこで ウジウジ言ってないで⸺　さっさと進みなさいよ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Deja de dudar y avanza de una vez.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This is no time to feel sorry for yourself. Get out there and move forward!

CONTENT: はい　いって... きます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Right! I'm on my way!

CONTENT: フフフ 何よ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What?

CONTENT: とっくに許してたんだなって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You've already forgiven her, haven't you?

CONTENT: あいつが負けたら 花嫁の私が困るの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Como la novia, no me interesa que pierda.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If she loses, I'll be in trouble as her bride.

CONTENT: あんたたちだって そうでしょ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That goes for all of you as well, doesn't it?

CONTENT: 私はスレッタが勝つって信じてるよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Yo confío en que ganará Suletta.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I have faith that Suletta will win.

CONTENT: おお... なんだ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Whoa! What the heck is that?

CONTENT: ご... ごめんなさい お邪魔します
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: M-My apologies! Sorry to be a bother!

CONTENT: おい 水星女! あ...　何しに来た! 決闘は今日じゃないぞ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿A qué viniste, mercuriana? El duelo no es hoy.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, Mercurian girl! What are you doing here? The duel isn't today!

CONTENT: うおっ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Whoa!

CONTENT: あの エランさんいますか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um... Is Mr. Elan there?

CONTENT: LP041 スレッタ・マーキュリーです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This is LP041, Suletta Mercury.

CONTENT: エランさんに話があって来ました
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I came... to talk to Mr. Elan.

CONTENT: 話? エラン・ケレスに?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Talk? To Elan Ceres?

CONTENT: あいつは応じないよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Good luck with that!

CONTENT: 俺たちとだって まともにしゃべらない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: He hardly talks to us, his housemates.

CONTENT: あのファラクトとかいう 機体のことも⸺　ペイル寮の生徒には 知らされていないんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Los de la residencia Pale no sabemos nada del Pharact.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nobody at Peil House knows a thing about that \"Pharact\" machine, either!

CONTENT: お願いします　どうしても話したいんです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por favor, tengo que hablar con él.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Please. I really would like to talk to him.

CONTENT: あ... あー あー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Testing... testing...

CONTENT: エランさん 聞こえてますか? スレッタです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Mr. Elan, can you hear me? It's Suletta!

CONTENT: エランさん　どうして あんたこと言ったんですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Mr. Elan! Why did you say that to me?

CONTENT: どうして決闘するんですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why do we have to duel?

CONTENT: どうして エアリアルが 欲しいんですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What do you want with Aerial?

CONTENT: 教えてください　私 うっとうしいですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Please tell me! Do I really annoy you?

CONTENT: ほら 言ったとおりだろ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: See? We told you so.

CONTENT: とっとと帰れよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Now go home!

CONTENT: ハッピーバースデートゥーユ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Happy birthday to you.

CONTENT: ハッピーバースデートゥーユ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Happy birthday to you.

CONTENT: ハッピーバースデー ハッピーバースデ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Happy birthday, happy birthday...

CONTENT: ハッピーバースデートゥーユ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Happy birthday to you.
CALL FROM ELAN

CONTENT: 帰ってくれ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Go home.

CONTENT: 僕に誕生日はないって言ったはずだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya te dije que no tenía cumpleaños.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I told you, I don't have a birthday.

CONTENT: だから... です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's why.

CONTENT: 今日を誕生日にするのは どうですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What if we made today your birthday?

CONTENT: 誕生日がないのは 寂しいじゃないですか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es triste que no tengas un cumpleaños.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't you feel empty without a birthday?

CONTENT: だから... やっぱり君は...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's why... You really do...

CONTENT: うっとうしいよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: annoy me.

CONTENT: 6番ゲート 開けてくれ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Open Gate No. 6!

CONTENT: カタパルト 超伝導ストレージ 異常なし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Catapulta y almacén de superconductividad en orden.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No anomalies in catapult superconductive storage.

CONTENT: フライトユニット各部の⸺　警告表示なし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No hay ninguna alerta de la unidad de vuelo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No error warnings on any components of the flight unit!

CONTENT: INSアライメント 問題なーし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No problems with INS alignment!

CONTENT: スレッタ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suletta?

CONTENT: エランさんと ちゃんと話せた?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Were you able to speak with Mr. Elan?

CONTENT: いえ でも...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No. But...

CONTENT: 決闘で賭けるものは決めました
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ya sé qué apostaré en el duelo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I did decide what my stake is in this duel.

CONTENT: 射出方向にオブジェクトなし　準備完了
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sin cuerpos en la trayectoria de eyección. Estamos listos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No obstacles in launch direction. We're ready!

CONTENT: ハッチ開けるぞー　射出権限をパイロットに移譲
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Abro la compuerta. Entrego la potestad de eyección al piloto.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Opening hatch! Transferring launch authorization to pilot.

CONTENT: 気張っていけよ! はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Go get him! Right!

CONTENT: LP041 スレッタ・マーキュリー　エアリアル 出ます!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: LP-041, Suletta Mercury. Aerial, en marcha.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: LP041, Suletta Mercury... Aerial, taking off!

CONTENT: 有効排気速度 問題なし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No problems with effective exhaust velocity.

CONTENT: スレッタ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suletta,

CONTENT: 進行方向前方にペイル寮の学園艦
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: la residencia Pale está en esa dirección.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Peil House's academic vessel is ahead on your course.

CONTENT: 星間物質を含む 脅威オブジェクトなし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No hazardous objects including interplanetary matter.

CONTENT: 射出準備完了 権限をパイロットに
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ready to launch. Transferring authorization to pilot.

CONTENT: KP002 エラン・ケレス　ファラクト 出る
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: KP-002, Elan Ceres. Pharact, en marcha.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: KP002, Elan Ceres... Pharact, launching.

CONTENT: ようこそ 歓迎するよ　ジェターク寮 新寮長 ラウダ・ニール
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Bienvenido, líder de la residencia Jeturk, Lauda Neill.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Welcome. Nice to meet you. Jeturk House's new leader, Lauda Neill.

CONTENT: 挨拶は不要です　さっさと決闘を始めてください
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No necesito saludos formales. Que comience el duelo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We can skip the formalities. Please just start the duel.

CONTENT: あんれー?　こないだの決闘 まだ根に持ってんすか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Aún estás resentido por el último duelo?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What's this? Are you still sore about that last duel?

CONTENT: 怖ー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ooh, scary...

CONTENT: これより 双方の合意のもと⸺　決闘を執り行う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El duelo se celebra por acuerdo mutuo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: With mutual consent by both parties, we will now begin the duel.

CONTENT: 勝敗は通常どおり⸺
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: As always, victory will go

CONTENT: 相手モビルスーツの⸺　ブレードアンテナを 折った者の勝利とする
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ganará el primero que rompa la antena del rival.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: to the first one to break the blade antenna of their opponent's mobile suit.

CONTENT: 立会人は グラスレー寮 寮長 シャディク・ゼネリが務める
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Yo, Shaddiq Zenelli, líder de la residencia Grassley, seré testigo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The observer shall be the leader of Grassley House, Shaddiq Zenelli.

CONTENT: 両者 向顔
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Both parties, face off.

CONTENT: エランさん...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Mr. Elan?

CONTENT: 水星ちゃん 決闘に賭けるものは決めた?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Mercurian Miss, have you decided what your stake is in this duel?

CONTENT: はい 私が勝ったら⸺　エランさんのこと教えてください
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí. Si gano yo, Elan me hablará de sí mismo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes, if I win, I want Mr. Elan to tell me all about himself.

CONTENT: え? それって...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? That sounds like...

CONTENT: 告白だな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A love confession.

CONTENT: ホント うっとうしいやつ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's really an annoying girl.

CONTENT: じゃあ 始めようか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well then, let's begin.

CONTENT: 勝敗は モビルスーツの性能のみで決まらず
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La victoria no se decide solo gracias al Mobile Suit.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Victory is never decided by mobile suit performance alone.

CONTENT: 操縦者の技のみで決まらず
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ni tampoco a la pericia del piloto.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nor by the skill of the pilot, alone.

CONTENT: ただ結果のみが真実
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El resultado es la única verdad.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The result itself is the only truth!

CONTENT: フィックス・リリース
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Fix release.

CONTENT: ニカさん スゴい これなら!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ms. Nika, this is amazing. At this rate...

CONTENT: 機体負荷 許容範囲内です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Machine load is within acceptable limits.

CONTENT: うまくいったな ニカ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nice work, Nika.

CONTENT: う... うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I... I guess...

CONTENT: 僕のことを教えてくれ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You want to know about me?

CONTENT: 僕はガンダムのために 作られた使い捨ての駒だ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Soy un peón creado solo para pilotar un Gundam.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm a disposable pawn created for the Gundam's sake.

CONTENT: そう答えれば君は満足なのか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is that enough for you?

CONTENT: 意外と意地が悪いじゃないか　スレッタ・マーキュリー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Resistes más de lo que esperaba, Suletta Mercury.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're more mean-spirited than I thought, Suletta Mercury!

CONTENT: 君は なんでも持っている
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You have everything.

CONTENT: 友達も家族も 過去も未来も...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Friends, family... A past and a future...

CONTENT: やりたいことリスト... 希望だって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A wish list of things to do... Even hope!

CONTENT: エラン... さん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Mr. Elan?

CONTENT: だったら勝利くらい僕にくれよ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Al menos déjame a mí la victoria!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Then why can't you spare me this victory?!

CONTENT: じゃなければ不公平すぎる!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Otherwise... it's just too unfair!

CONTENT: エアリアル!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Aerial!

CONTENT: エラン...　らしくない熱さじゃないか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Elan, no es normal verte tan alterado.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Elan... I've never seen you so worked up.

CONTENT: なんつう機動だよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What mobility!

CONTENT: 速すぎんだろ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's way too fast.

CONTENT: フロント外宙域を指定してきたのは こういうことか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This is why they chose the airspace outside the front.

CONTENT: 急ごしらえのフライトユニットじゃ 追いつけないよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Una unidad de vuelo hecha a mano no está a su nivel.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She'll never keep up using a flight unit we threw together!

CONTENT: このままだと...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: At this rate...

CONTENT: アウトレンジで なぶり殺しだな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: He'll torture her to death from out of range.

CONTENT: そんなー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But that's...

CONTENT: たとえ 距離を詰めたとしても⸺　その次は...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Even if she does manage to get close, next he'll...

CONTENT: パーメットスコア 3
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Permet score, three.

CONTENT: 来た! やっぱ それかよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There they are! I knew it!

CONTENT: あれに触れたら⸺　装甲の上からでも 電気系統はアウトだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si lo toca, inutilizará todo lo electrónico.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If any of them touch her, even through her armor, her electrical systems will be blown.

CONTENT: スレッタ よけて はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suletta, evade it!

CONTENT: 逃がさない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You won't get away.

CONTENT: やられた! うるさい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's hit! Shut up!

CONTENT: そのガンビットは ここで潰す
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That GUND-Bit is finished.

CONTENT: みんな!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Everyone!

CONTENT: ガンビットの制御は向こうが上か
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's better at controlling GUND-Bits than me.

CONTENT: スピード勝負じゃ ペイル社のモビルスーツが有利だ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El Mobile Suit de Pale es más rápido.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: In a contest of speed, a Peil mobile suit will always have the advantage.

CONTENT: どうする スレッタ・マーキュリー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What now? Suletta Mercury...

CONTENT: このままじゃ追いつけない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I can't catch him at this rate.

CONTENT: お願い みんな　力を貸して!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Please, everyone! Give me your strength!

CONTENT: エアリアルを加速した
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The Aerial has sped up, too.

CONTENT: 追いかけっこっすか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They're playing chase, huh?

CONTENT: うっとうしさも ここまでくれば筋金入りだよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Llegados a este punto, te mereces una medalla por incordiar.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Her annoying behavior is as tough as the hardest alloys.

CONTENT: パーメットスコア 4!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Permet score, four!

CONTENT: 無茶しますねー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's really pushing it.

CONTENT: 力技すぎるでしょ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's forcing it too far.

CONTENT: でも 確実に近づいてる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But she's definitely getting closer.

CONTENT: ロウジ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Rouji?

CONTENT: 領空灯 出ちゃいましたね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Salieron de la zona de las luces.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They've passed the border lights.

CONTENT: まずい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This is bad.

CONTENT: データストームが 許容値をオーバーしてる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La tormenta de datos de Permet se excedió.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The data storm has exceeded acceptable limits.

CONTENT: あ... 散開!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Deploy!

CONTENT: よっしゃ! あたった!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Got him! That's a hit!

CONTENT: あっ... スレッタ!　フライトユニット 左翼損傷
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suletta! There's damage to the flight unit's left wing.

CONTENT: ベルメリア・ウィンストン　あんたの見立ては間違ってたよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Belmeria Winston... Your diagnosis missed the mark.

CONTENT: それでも君だけは否定してみせる!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But even so, I'll at least deny your worth,

CONTENT: スレッタ・マーキュリー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Suletta Mercury!

CONTENT: まずい! 逃げろ スレッタ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Get out of there, Suletta!

CONTENT: あ... 捉えた!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's trapped!

CONTENT: 動かない 何をした!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nothing's moving. What did she do?

CONTENT: 君は...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're...

CONTENT: おっしゃー! フフフ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: All right!

CONTENT: やったー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes! She did it!

CONTENT: 記録できた? さっきの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did you get a record of that?

CONTENT: パーメットデコーディング情報　記録完了
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Permet decoding data, recording complete.

CONTENT: ふいー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Phew...

CONTENT: ありがとう お疲れさま エアリアル
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thank you. Good work, Aerial.

CONTENT: 今日は いつもより 声聞こえた気がする
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hoy siento que te escuché más que de costumbre.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I feel like I could hear your voice more than ever today.

CONTENT: エラン... さん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Mr. Elan...

CONTENT: そうか...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So that's it.

CONTENT: そうだったのか...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I never knew...

CONTENT: エランさん... エランさん...　エランさん!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Mr. Elan! Mr. Elan! Mr. Elan!

CONTENT: エランさん　ごめん... なさい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Mr. Elan? I'm really sorry.

CONTENT: ケガ ないですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you hurt?

CONTENT: \"賭けは僕のことを教える\" だったね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tengo que contarte algo sobre mí, ¿no?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Your stake was to learn about me, wasn't it?

CONTENT: いたんだ 昔　誕生日 祝ってくれる人
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hace tiempo sí había alguien que celebraba mi cumpleaños.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I did have someone. Long ago. Someone who would celebrate my birthday.

CONTENT: 僕には何もないと思っていた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: All this time, I thought I had nothing.

CONTENT: けど そうじゃなかった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But... it wasn't true.

CONTENT: そうじゃなかったんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It wasn't true!

CONTENT: そんなの おかしいです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No es normal que digas eso.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You've got it all wrong.

CONTENT: え?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh?

CONTENT: 誕生日を祝ってくれる人 います　私もいます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí que hay gente para celebrar tu cumpleaños. Yo incluida.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There are people who will celebrate your birthday. I'm one of them.

CONTENT: エランさんに 何もないなんてこと⸺　絶対にないです!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Te aseguro que no es verdad que no tengas nada.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's absolutely wrong to say you have nothing, Mr. Elan!

CONTENT: そうだね　おかしいね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's true. I've had it wrong.

CONTENT: いいの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you okay with this?

CONTENT: 私は理解ある花嫁なの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm an understanding bride.

CONTENT: 多少の浮気くらい許してあげるわ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Le permitiré que me sea infiel un rato.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I can tolerate... some minor two-timing.

CONTENT: 遅い!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: He's late!

CONTENT: 約束の時間まで まだありますよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's not even the meeting time yet.

CONTENT: 5分前には来るもんでしょ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: He should be 5 minutes early!

CONTENT: ミオリネさん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ms. Miorine!

CONTENT: その... ありがとう... ございました
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um... Thank you... very much.

CONTENT: 門限 守んなさいよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Just obey your curfew, okay?

CONTENT: お願いします ニューゲンCEO
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Please, Ms. Nugen!

CONTENT: 4号には経験があります!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Number Four is experienced!

CONTENT: 決闘のデータをフィードバック させる選択肢だって...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Podemos usar el feedback del combate...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We could always choose to feed back the duel data-

CONTENT: 使命を果たせない 強化人士に次はない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Un sujeto potenciado debe cumplir su misión.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: An enhanced person who can't carry out their orders has no future.

CONTENT: あなたも分かっているでしょ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You should understand that.

CONTENT: スペアは まだあるわ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We still have spares.

CONTENT: 早く次を用意することね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Prepare the next one promptly.

CONTENT: ハッピーバースデー...　トゥーユー...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Happy birthday to you.

CONTENT: ハッピーバースデートゥーユ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Happy birthday to you.

CONTENT: ハッピーバースデー...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Happy birthday...

CONTENT: ハッピーバースデ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Happy birthday...

CONTENT: ハッピーバースデー トゥ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Happy birthday... to...

CONTENT: まだかな エランさん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Will you be here soon, Mr. Elan?
